title: Language Competency Enhancement Program for Working Professionals Using Emergency Remote Education in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Digital-based real-time interactive education considering limited physical contact during pandemics

learning_goals: Learners can practice job-related verbal communication scenarios three or more times using online collaboration tools
Learners achieve a 20% improvement in pronunciation accuracy through the process of accepting linguistic feedback in digital environments
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning strategies under pandemic constraints
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
